articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Goes Round Central Tree Nursery
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Goes Round Central Tree Nursery
						
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, went round the Central Tree Nursery of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection and the tree nursery workshop of the Phyongwon County Forestry Management Station.
					 He encouraged their officials and employees in their efforts to raise saplings of great economic use.
					
					 He underlined the need to build well central and local tree nurseries, know well about the intention of the party on putting the sapling production on a scientific, industrialized and intensive basis, give priority to sapling raising and push forward tree planting on a long-term basis and in a planned way.
					
					 He called upon all officials and other people to arm themselves with Kim Jong Il's patriotism, value and love even a blade of grass and a tree of the country and turn out as one in the noble patriotic work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DWUK Spokeswoman Slams Sexual Slavery for GIs in S. Korea
articles.content:
DWUK Spokeswoman Slams Sexual Slavery for GIs in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- A spokeswoman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) released a statement Friday denouncing the sexual slavery committed by the U.S. imperialist aggression troops in south Korea.
					 The Wall Street Journal in its recent article said that sex stations have been installed and operated in villages of U.S. military bases in south Korea at tacit connivance of the puppet government, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					  The majority of the women taken to the stations were those driven into dire poverty or those who were abducted by gangsters and sold off. They can not walk out of the villages once they go into them. The south Korean puppet government directly controls the villages and mobilizes police to prevent women from running away. It called the women in the villages "patriots" and told them not to cause any trouble with GIs.
					
					 "Comfort women for the U.S. forces" are said to number thousands in south Korea.
					
					 The sexual slavery for the U.S. imperialist aggression troops is little short of the hideous sexual slavery enforced by the Japanese imperialists against Korean women in the past. This is an intolerable insult to the Korean women and a wanton encroachment upon the dignity of the Korean nation.
					
					 The Central Committee of the DWUK brands the sexual slavery committed by the U.S. imperialist aggression troops against south Korean women as one of the unpardonable, most hideous human rights abuses of modern version.
					
					 Since they set their foot in south Korea, GIs did not hesitate to commit all kinds of abnormal and shuddering crimes against women and this was connived at and encouraged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities.
					
					 Nothing has changed in the miserable situation of the south Korean women since the present chief executive took office in Chongwadae but shuddering sexual assaults against women have become all the more undisguised.
					
					 There is no such despicable group of traitors like the south Korean puppet forces as they behave so cowardly as to offer fellow women as sexual slaves for the foreign occupation troops and shield their sexual slavery.
					
					 As long as the U.S. aggression troops are present in south Korea and the group of pro-U.S. lackeys stay in power, the history of shame will go on and south Korean women can never get rid of the sexual slavery.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces should apologize for the sexual slavery for the U.S. forces in south Korea and own full responsibility.
					
					 South Korean women and other people of all social standings should actively turn out in the struggle to drive the U.S. aggression troops, the root cause of misfortune and pain of Koreans, out of south Korea and settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Koreans.

articles.title: Russia, Korean Peninsula Crossing Car Riding Group Arrives
articles.content:
Russia, Korean Peninsula Crossing Car Riding Group Here
						
 Rason, August 8 (KCNA) -- A Russia, Korean Peninsula crossing car riding group headed by Kim Chil Song, first vice-chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans who is chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, arrived at Tumangang Railway Station on Friday to take part in the "Paektu-Halla car riding for supporting the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula" marking the 150th anniversary of the immigration of Koreans to Russia.

articles.title: Vietnamese President Meets DPRK Government Delegation
articles.content:
Vietnamese President Meets DPRK Government Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Vietnamese President Truong Tan Sang on Aug. 7 met and had a talk with the DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to Vietnam.
					 He said that thanks to the wise leadership of President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung, the bilateral relations have developed with deep roots, adding that it is the consistent stand of the Vietnamese party and state to boost the bilateral relations as taught by the preceding leaders.
					
					 The Vietnamese party and government always remember the material and moral assistance rendered by the party and government of the DPRK to the Vietnamese people in the difficult period including anti-U.S. resistance for national salvation and feel grateful for it, he said.
					
					 Noting that Vietnam admires the successes being achieved by the Korean people in their efforts to ensure the security of the country, develop the economy and improve the people's standard of living under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, he affirmed the invariable stand of the party and government of Vietnam that Korea should be reunified independently and peacefully free from foreign interference.
					
					 He hoped that both countries would make joint efforts to boost the bilateral relations in political and economic and various other fields on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries next year.

articles.title: Senior Official of CPV Meets DPRK Government Delegation
articles.content:
Senior Official of CPV Meets DPRK Government Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Le Hong Anh, member of the Political Bureau and standing secretary of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, Thursday met and had a talk with the DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to Vietnam.
					 Le Hong Anh said that the relations between the DPRK and Vietnam are the militant and comradely special relations provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung and a precious treasure, adding that it is the steadfast will of the Communist Party of Vietnam to invariably carry forward and develop the tradition of friendship true to the behests of the preceding leaders.
					
					 He said he was rejoiced over the fact that under the outstanding leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the Korean people have protected socialism and maintained political stability from the military threat and sanctions of the U.S. and the West and made great successes in building the economy and improving the people's living standard. 
					
					 He expressed admiration for the excellent policy and strong will of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, and positive solidarity with them.
					
					 The Communist Party of Vietnam sets store by the development of relations with the WPK, he said, hoping that the two parties would exchange the successes and experience gained in the party building and revolutionary struggle through brisk visits and contacts between them and develop the bilateral relations.

articles.title: Zimbabwean President Hopes for Korean People's Successes in Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Zimbabwean President Hopes for Korean People's Successes in Building Thriving Nation
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- I wish the Korean people, dynamically advancing along the road of justice chosen by themselves under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un, greater successes in building a thriving nation.
					 Robert G. Mugabe, president of Zimbabwe, said this when receiving credentials from DPRK Ambassador to his country Jo Yong Man on July 31.
					
					 He said he was pleased that the friendly relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung are continuing to develop favorably.

articles.title: Reception Given by ASEAN Committee Here
articles.content:
Reception Given by ASEAN Committee Here 
						
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The ASEAN Committee here gave a reception Friday on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN). 
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
					
					 Present there were Vietnamese Ambassador Le Quang Ba, Indonesian Ambassador Nasri Gustaman, Lao Ambassador Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Cambodian Ambassador Op Sisawada, Charge d' affaires ad interim of the Malaysian embassy Salmah Binti Ahmad and staff members of foreign embassies.

articles.title: National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods Held
articles.content:
National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- There took place in the DPRK from Aug. 1 to 8 the National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods.
					 More than 124 000 items of consumer goods of over 1 500 varieties including sundry goods, small articles for daily use, and food were on display at the People's Palace of Culture, the venue of the exhibition.
					
					Factories, enterprises, housewives' work-teams and reutilization production work-teams across the country produced such goods by using internal reserves.
					
					 Various goods including garments, shoes and toys attracted great attention of the visitors.
					
					 Grasswork and household goods produced by several units of North and South Hwanghae and North Phyongan provinces meeting the fashions and requirements of people were popular among the visitors.
					
					 The products presented by Pyongyang City, including children's wear, raincoats and bags, and swimming slips presented by North Hamgyong Province and Nampho City were appreciated by visitors for their usefulness and high quality.
					
					 During the exhibition a discussion was held to reenergize the production of such goods and a meeting took place to exchange experience.
					
					 Visitors were busy buying those goods.

articles.title: Propagation of Freshwater Resources Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Propagation of Freshwater Resources Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is steadily pushing forward with a drive to propagate the freshwater resources.
					 This year alone, the fish farming and breeding stations in Pyongyang have released over 4.7 million fries in the Taedong and Pothong rivers.
					
					 In this regard, Kim Kwon Hui, an official of the Pyongyang City Fish Farming Management Bureau, told KCNA:
					
					 The employees of the Taedonggang fish farming and breeding station secured highly productive seed fishes and increased the production of spawn.
					
					 They purified fishponds to ensure breeding conditions for seed fishes with effective use of natural feed.
					
					 Breeding stations in Samsok District and Kangnam County have also increased the production of spawn of Cyprinus carpio and Carassius auratus.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Bureau is paying deep attention to the breeding of herbivorous fishes like sliver carp and Aristichythys nobilis, while taking measures to prevent flood damage.

articles.title: DPRK Women Defeats Finnish Rivals by 2:1
articles.content:
DPRK Women Defeats Finnish Rivals by 2:1
						
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Football fans of the DPRK are very pleased by the news that the DPRK defeated Finland by 2:1 in the first league match of the FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup 2014.
					 Yun Chol Nam, a workshop head of the Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326, said:
					
					 The DPRK girls played a good game in the first match, and it pleases all employees of my workshop.
					
					 Han Yong Suk, a Pyongyang citizen, said:
					
					 It is praiseworthy that the DPRK girls won the first victory in the U-20 women's world cup.
					
					 Eight years ago, the DPRK girls took the title in the U-20 Women's World Cup 2006, thus promoting the country to the first Asian winner of the World Cup. I hope that the DPRK team would prove successful in the matches.
					
					 The DPRK team includes 14 players, who played an active role in the U-17 Women's World Cup 2012.
					
					 The FIFA website selected Ri Un Sim as one of best players in the current world cup for scoring 8 goals in the six matches of the U-17 Women's World Cup 2012.

articles.title: DPRK's Sports Aces (8)
articles.content:
DPRK's Sports Aces (8)
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Chol Hwan of the DPRK was a double world free-style wrestling champion in the 48 kg category.
					 He began wrestling when studying at the third grade of a secondary school. 
					
					 He took the first gold medal at the Asian Junior Wrestling Championship in Juche 66 (1977).
					
					 Later, he was active at the then Pyongyang Municipal Sports Team, holding the limelight on the mat.
					
					 He proved successful at several international championships.
					
					 At the 22nd World Free-style Wrestling Championship held in September 1983, he defeated the candidate champion from the former Soviet Union in the 48 kg category, bringing home a trophy, gold medal and two champion belts.
					
					 It was the first time for the DPRK to have the wrestling champion.
					
					 At the 23rd World Free-style Wrestling Championship, he overpowered a U.S. rival in the semi-finals of the 48 kg category and an Iranian challenger in the finals. 
					
					 He won 14 gold medals at international championships in less than five years from the year 1981.
					
					 He was awarded the title of Labor Hero as well as the title of People's Athlete.

articles.title: Minju Joson on DPRK's Mode of Counteraction
articles.content:
Minju Joson on DPRK's Mode of Counteraction 
						
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. announced that 12 more F-15E fighters, the prototype ones of its Air Force, would be deployed in south Korea, focus efforts on joint operation drills for striking bases of provocation and supporting forces and take part in Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says this is a cynical ploy to conceal its belligerent nature and justify and kick off Ulji Freedom Guardian at any cost.
					
					 It goes on: Ulji Freedom Guardian which the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers describe as "annual one" is, in essence, nuclear war maneuvers for invading the DPRK.
					
					 This is evidenced by their plan to apply "tailored deterrence strategy" to the joint military exercises.
					
					 The said strategy is the one for mounting a dangerous preemptive nuclear attack by mobilizing all military means including nuclear weapons after judging itself  a "sign of the use of nukes" by the other party.
					
					 The present reality clearly proves how just the DPRK was when it bolstered up its deterrence for self-defence in every way with the nuclear force as its pivot.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK demonstrated their capability to destroy everything of the U.S. whether it is a nuclear carrier or nuclear submarine through a series of successful rocket firing drills.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready to counter nukes in kind and resolutely cope with annual and regular military exercises for invading it through annual and regular military drills for waging a great just war for national reunification. This is the resolute mode of counter-action of Songun Korea.
					
					 If the U.S. and puppet warmongers kick off Ulji Freedom Guardian, it will only entail the consequences of bringing a miserable ruin to them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Escalating Tensions on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Escalating Tensions on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- This year, too, the DPRK advanced positive peace proposals and took practical steps for putting them into practice. But the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces staged Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, joint landing drill largest-ever since 1993 and biggest-ever joint aerial drill. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article.
					 It was quite natural that the army and people of the DPRK conducted military drills including tactical rocket firing for self-defence and shelling exercises with different missions to cope with the ever-more undisguised U.S. military moves against it, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The shameless U.S. labeled the DPRK's regular military exercises "threat" and "provocation". Not content with this, it orchestrated again a farce of "denouncing" them, claming they are a "violation of resolutions" at the UN Security Council.
					
					 The U.S. is mulling deploying THAAD in south Korea. It is going to stage again Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises with south Korean puppet forces under the signboard of "annual ones" in mid-August.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. is the arch criminal disturbing the peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. steadily escalating nuclear threat and blackmail would compel the DPRK to put great spurs to bolstering up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence. As long as the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces persist in their joint military exercises for aggression against the DPRK, its counter-actions will be put on an annual and regular basis.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Reactionary Nature of American-style "Liberty"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Reactionary Nature of American-style "Liberty"
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The reactionary ruling quarters and the paid media of the U.S. often trumpet about "liberty" in a bid to create impression that the American society guarantees people liberty and democracy. Calling the U.S. a "free world", they talk rubbish that the "wind of liberty" should be sent to other countries.
					 An article of Rodong Sinmun Friday says such "liberty" touted by them is, needless to say, aimed to embellish the American society and bring down political systems in other countries.
					
					 "Liberty" trumpeted about by the U.S. is, in short, "freedom" for the rich.
					
					 The reactionary nature of American-style "liberty" is that it is a deceptive means for justifying the capitalists' act of bleeding the toiling masses white and violating their freedom and rights.
					
					 Exploitation and plunder of the toiling masses are institutionalized in the capitalist society. This is because the state sovereignty and production means are in the hands of a tiny handful of privileged class.
					
					 The reactionary nature of American-style "liberty" can also be found in that it is aimed to secure a pretext for maintaining the fascist and unpopular social system.
					
					 The U.S. act is to internationally isolate those countries which incur its displeasure and are disobedient to it and to make a breach for forcing American-style and Western view on value on them.
					
					 The toiling masses can never have genuine freedom and rights in the American society where the mode of existence based on jungle law is prevalent.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats Performed in Party Building
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats Performed in Party Building 
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The cause of modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism that began with the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea could be successfully carried out thanks to the rare wisdom and energetic guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It was thanks to him that the limitations of the preceding theories were clarified and the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung was formulated as Kimilsungism to shine as the most scientific and revolutionary guiding idea in our era, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Regarding it as the fundamental principle governing the party-building to establish the ideological system of the leader, Kim Jong Il put great efforts into establishing the oneness of idea and leadership.
					
					 He clarified that the idea of modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism is, in essence, means establishing the monolithic system of thinking and leadership within the party, and energetically led the struggle to build the party into an ideologically pure entity and an integral organization which moves as one under the guidance of the leader, based on monolithic idea of the leader.
					
					 He made sure that the party members accepted the party's policies as the most just ones and worked and lived with them as the unique guidelines, thereby turning the course of carrying out the party's policies into the process of revolutionizing themselves and arming themselves  with the monolithic idea.
					
					 He led the work to make all the party members prove to be seeds of revolution and brave fighters who carry out the party's policies in staunch spirit by learning from the indomitable fighting spirit displayed by the revolutionary forerunners who implemented the leader's order to the letter under whatever conditions and circumstances.
					
					 The cause of modeling the whole party on the monolithic idea is being successfully realized by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Songun Politics of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Songun Politics of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK have won one victory after another by successfully meeting the blatant challenge of the aggressor forces of imperialism with the arms of justice under the banner of great Songun, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il's Songun politics is the one for protecting the nation and patriotic politics. 
					
					 The past more than five decades during which he provided Songun revolutionary leadership were a stern yet exciting period crowded with unprecedented events and all sorts of hardships in carrying out the Korean revolution and the cause of national reunification.
					
					 He courageously met the challenge of history under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 His Songun politics were associated with steadfast will for reunification, brave decision and all-embracing magnanimity. This was the driving force which ushered in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 At a time when the 20th century was replaced by the 21st century, the north-south summit was provided for the first time in the history of national division and the June 15 joint declaration, the milestone of reunification common to the nation, was adopted. This would be unthinkable without his Songun politics.
					
					 He led the struggle for defending socialism and nation minus gunfire to one victory after another with invincible Songun politics in the most trying period, put the DPRK on the status of the world's military power and provided favorable environment for achieving the country's reunification. These were the greatest feats of the national historic significance performed by him.

articles.title: U.S. Should Withdraw "Strategic Patience Policy" toward DPRK: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Should Withdraw "Strategic Patience Policy" toward DPRK: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Obama administration's policy toward the DPRK is becoming an issue high on the agenda.
					 Displeasure with the administration's foreign policy runs high in the U.S. and there is a flurry of criticism from institutes for policy studies that the U.S. policy lacks strategy and any clear tactical goal. Against this backdrop there was harsh criticism at a hearing of the Subcommittee on Asian and Pacific Affairs under the International Relations Committee of the U.S. House of Representatives that the lazy policy of the administration called "strategic patience" is being torn to pieces and the U.S. is waiting for north Korea to beg for negotiations, how long will the policy of the strategic patience last and should we be patient for hundreds and thousands of years.
					
					 The U.S. "strategic patience policy" toward the DPRK is bound to go bust for its vulnerable and reactionary nature.
					
					 After its emergence the Obama administration adopted it as its reactionary foreign policy to isolate and stifle the DPRK, pursuant to the "strategic patience policy", a replica of the preceding government's hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Pursuant to this "policy of waiting", the U.S. has escalated its moves to stifle the DPRK while pressurizing it to "dismantle its nukes first" and isolating it in military, economic and diplomatic fields.
					
					 Denying the legitimate right to develop space of a sovereign state, the U.S. instigated the UN Security Council to adopt a "resolution on sanctions." It has perpetrated high-handed hostile acts against the DPRK.
					
					 Being steeped in antagonism toward the DPRK to the marrow of its bone, the U.S. turned down all its constructive proposals to settle the unstable situation on the Korean peninsula as well as broad-minded offers made by it to discuss various issues including the denuclearization of the peninsula and the rest of the world. Moreover, the U.S. has persistently escalated blockade and military pressure.
					
					 Staging offensive and aggressive joint military exercises non-stop, the U.S. has steadily made nuclear blackmail against the DPRK while increasing the frequency and scale of those exercises.
					
					 Due to the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK, it was compelled to have access to nukes under the grave situation in which the supreme interests of the country were encroached upon.
					
					 The DPRK ranked itself among the nuclear weapons states and had access to powerful nuclear strike means. The responsibility for this development entirely rests with the U.S.
					
					 With the passage of time, the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a political power, military power and a nuclear weapons state capable of countering the U.S. nuclear blackmail with more powerful nuclear strike means and an all-out attack with all-people resistance of justice.
					
					 The U.S. policymakers failed to calculate the consequences to be entailed by the "strategic patience policy". This was a serious mistake made by them. 
					
					 A senior researcher at the Cato Research Institute, U.S. said American leaders are plunging themselves into a quagmire as regards north Korea policy. In fact, Obama administration's north Korea policy is beset with danger of causing the worst results.
					
					 It is ridiculous for the Obama administration to continue pinning hope on the bankrupt "strategic patience policy." 
					
					 Wasting time with this strategy would only help put the DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrence on a more elite basis.
					
					 Foolish, indeed, are those who are handling the U.S. DPRK policy.
					
					 The U.S. had better judge the situation with a cool head and make a political decision in line with the trend of the times.

articles.title: Protest against Puppet Army Mounts in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest against Puppet Army Mounts in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Protest against the puppet army is mounting high among south Koreans as inhuman violence and murders have become endemic in the army, according to a south Korean internet newspaper on August 5.
					 Parents with their sons just before being enlisted in the army are trembling with fear. They say they can hardly go asleep, worried about their sons and they feel uneasy about their possible death.
					
					 Those, who have their sons serving in the army, plan to have their sons' clothes put off when they go to see them.
					
					 People of all social standings are also becoming increasingly critical of the puppet military authorities.
					
					 An article posted on a website on August 2 said there are not a few problems in the army including violence.
					
					 It queried why the military command is not reformed and why those responsible don't tender resignation, stressing that the recent violence in the army is little short of the Sewol accident.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister's Reckless Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister's Reckless Remarks under Fire 
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, chief of the Hailin City branch of the General Association of Koreans in China, made public an article titled "A rabid dog dancing to the nuclear tune of the U.S. must be beaten to death" on August 1.
					 South Korean puppet minister of Defense Han Min Gu recklessly wagged his tongue to enrage the Korean nation.
					
					 Han who had taken the lead in escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen, holding a rifle given by his American master, rose to the post of minister with all kinds of gimmicks and sycophancy. He dared cry out for "punishment" and "counteraction" against the DPRK just like a rabid dog.
					
					 These outbursts were let loose by such idiot Han who unhesitatingly clung to the stingy coattails of the U.S. in pursuance of his own luxury and glory.
					
					 Han will have to pay a dear price for letting loose thoughtless remarks like a mere child.
					
					 He had better stop such rubbish as "existence of social system" and keep his mouth shut if he wants to prolong his remaining days.
					
					 If he continues slandering the DPRK, its army and people will never tolerate him but beat him into a jelly.

articles.title: Concealment of Violence in Puppet Army Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Concealment of Violence in Puppet Army Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- An editorial of the south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo on August 5 disclosed the attempts made by those in the upper echelon of the puppet army to cover up in an organized way violence committed in the army.
					 There were at least five attempts made by those in the upper echelon of the military to cover up the death of a private in the 28th division.
					
					 This was aimed to shield the military authorities including the then Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin. There is a strong suspicion that the upper echelon of the army might have known the gravity of the situation.
					
					 Right after the occurrence of the incident Kim Kwan Jin and the chief of the general staff of the army held meetings related to army disciplines, a proof that they might have known about it.
					
					 The present chief executive calls for taking measures over the recent incident but public brands it as Sewol accident of the army version and there is strong tendency to boycott recruitment. Those measures will, therefore, be nothing but a stop-gap measure and a trick to shirk off the responsibilities.
					
					 Who will believe that violence in the army can be halted under such regime, the editorial queried.
					
					 It stressed that the above-said beating of a private to death will continue to occur as long as the incompetent regime is allowed to stay.

articles.title: U.S. Should Roll Back Hostile Policy toward DPRK: Koreans in Germany
articles.content:
U.S. Should Roll Back Hostile Policy toward DPRK: Koreans in Germany
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany released a statement titled "The U.S. should roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK" on August 3.
					 The statement said the U.S. has become aloud in saying that the situation gets tense due to the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and that it was forced to pursue the hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 This is a trick to cover up the cause and absurdity of the policy, and a far-fetched assertion distorting history and reality, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. had pursued the hostile policy toward the DPRK even before the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula spawned.
					
					 It has resorted to the hostile policy toward the DPRK to realize its strategy to dominate Asia. It has systematically scrapped the Armistice Agreement and deliberately moved to make ceasefire a permanent one, denying all the peace-oriented proposals offered by the DPRK.
					
					 After rounding off operational plans of various forms to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK, the U.S. has staged large-scale joint military exercises with various codenames every year.
					
					 It has not spared investment in operations for anti-DPRK spy activities, ideological and cultural poisoning and disorganization of the DPRK while applying economic sanctions and blockade against it even before the occurrence of the nuclear issue.
					
					 Historical facts prove that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is not attributable to the DPRK's access to nukes but that the DPRK's possession of nuclear weapons is attributable to the U.S. hostile policy.
					
					 Needless to say, the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has to be withdrawn in order to have the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula settled.

articles.title: Day of Korean People's Victory in War Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Korean People's Victory in War Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Various countries and international bodies posted special write-ups and articles on their websites from July 23 to 25 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "History of revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung for the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The article dealt in detail with the fact that the President instilled conviction in victory and courage into the service personnel and people with his deep trust and loving care while making ceaseless trips to the front and rear during the days of the hard-fought war and led the war to victory with his outstanding military wisdom, strategies and tactics.
					
					 The Party for the Socialist Choice of Romania in an article titled "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" said that the victory achieved by the Korean people in the Korean war under his wise guidance would always be remembered not only by the Korean people but also by the world progressives.
					
					 The South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted articles entitled "Truth about the outbreak of the Korean war", "Bitter defeat of the U.S." and "Lesson taught by Korean war: U.S. strength is not all-powerful."
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany in an article titled "July 27 of DPRK" said that July 27 is the day when the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world bent its knees before the Korean people.
					
					 The MS Travel Agency of Germany posted "People know only victory", "July 27, 1953 is the day of victory in the Fatherland Liberation War" and other articles.
					
					 The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain also posted articles captioned "Comrade Kim Il Sung who demonstrated his qualifications as outstanding leader in the war" and "Invincible commander Comrade Kim Il Sung" illustrated with his photo.

articles.title: UMDC condena crimenes de esclavitud sexual de tropas yanquis  ocupantes de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
UMDC condena crimenes de esclavitud sexual de tropas yanquis  ocupantes de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- La portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea hizo publica el dia 8 una declaracion de condena a los crimenes de esclavitud sexual para las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea.
					Recientemente, el periodico estadounidense Wall Street Journal inserto un articulo revelando generalmente el hecho de que bajo la tolerancia y amparo del gobierno titere surcoreano, en las villas militares norteamericanas se instalaron y se gestionaron las oficinas de compraventa sexual.
					
					De acuerdo con ello, la mayoria de las mujeres llevadas a las oficinas son las pobres y  otras secuestradas por los gangsteres y ellas no pueden liberarse a su antojo de las villas militares. Para colmo, el gobierno titere surcoreano gestiona directamente esas oficinas y movilizo a las policias para que las mujeres no huyeran. Ademas, impuso a ellas que no produjeran problemas con los uniformados yanquis, elogiandolas como "patriotas".
					
					Se dice que en el Sur de Corea llegan a miles tales "consoladoras para el ejercito estadounidense".
					
					La nota subraya que el hecho no se diferencia ni en lo minimo de los delitos cometidos en el pasado por los imperialistas japoneses contra las mujeres coreanas, y lo condena como insulto intolerable a las coreanas y violacion flagrante a la dignidad de nuestra nacion, y continua:
					
					El CC de la UMDC califica el crimen de esclavitud sexual, cometido por las tropas agresoras norteamericanas contra las mujeres surcoreanas, de delito anti-DDHH nunca  tolerable de peor calana y de crimen de lesa humanidad de moderna version.
					
					Desde el primer dia de su entrada en el suelo surcoreano, los uniformados norteamericanos han venido cometiendo sin vacilacion los anormales crimenes de esclavitud sexual, lo cual se ampara y se instiga activamente por las autoridades norteamericanas y surcoreanas.
					
					Aun despues de la toma del poder de la mandataria actual surcoreana, tales condiciones miserables de las mujeres surcoreanas no se han mejorado nunca, y al contrario se hicieron mas graves los crimenes sexuales por parte de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas.
					
					En este mundo no hay traidores tan asquerosos como los titeres surcoreanos que ofrendan como esclavas sexuales las mujeres de su nacionalidad a las tropas ocupantes extranjeras y defienden los abusos sexuales de estas.
					
					Mientras tales tropas estan acampadas en el Sur de Corea y existen los traidores proyanquis, continuara la historia de verguenza y las mujeres surcoreanas no se liberaran del destino de esclavas sexuales.
					
					EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana deben pedir disculpas por los crimenes de esclavitud sexual y asumir la responsabilidad total del caso.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores, inclusive las mujeres, y todos los demas compatriotas deben levantarse en la lucha por expulsar cuanto antes a las tropas norteamericanas, fuente de desgracias y sufrimientos, y ajustar las cuentas finales de los crimenes del imperialismo norteamericano, enemigo jurado de nuestra nacion.

articles.title: Presidente vietnamita desea reunificacion independiente y pacifica de Corea
articles.content:
Presidente vietnamita desea reunificacion independiente y pacifica de Corea 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, Truong Tan Sang, departio el dia 7 con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presidida por el canciller Ri Su Yong, de visita en su pais.
					En la ocasion, el presidente senalo que bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente Ho Chi Minh y el Presidente Kim Il Sung se desarrollaron profundamente las relaciones de los dos paises y subrayo que desarrollar las relaciones bilaterales como dijeron los lideres antecedentes es la invariable posicion del partido y el Estado de Vietnam.
					
					Destaco que el partido y el gobierno de Vietnam aprecian y sienten agradecidos siempre por la ayuda material y espiritual enviada por el partido y el gobierno de la RPDC al pueblo vietnamita en el dificil periodo incluyendo la resistencia de salvacion nacional antiyanqui.
					
					Expreso admiracion ante los exitos logrados por el pueblo coreano en la defensa de la seguridad del pais, en el desarrollo economico y la mejora de vida del pueblo bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Afirmo que la reunificacion de Corea debe ser resuelta de manera independiente y por via pacifica sin intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras, lo cual es la invariable posicion del partido y el gobierno de Vietnam.
					
					Deseo que con motivo del 65o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas en el proximo ano, los dos paises se esforzaran en comun por fortalecer mas las relaciones bilaterales en la politica, la economia y otras ramas.

articles.title: Le Hong Anh expresa voluntad de desarrollar relaciones con PTC
articles.content:
Le Hong Anh expresa voluntad de desarrollar relaciones con PTC 
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- Le Hong Anh, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario permanente del Secretariado del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, se reunio el dia 7 con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presidida por el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Ri Su Yong, de visita en Vietnam.
					En la ocasion, el secretario vietnamita dijo que las relaciones Vietnam-RPDC son vinculos combativos, camaraderiles y especiales y patrimonio valioso preparado por el Presidente Ho Chi Minh y el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Enfatizo que continuar y desarrollar invariablemente la tradicion de amistad cumpliendo los legados de los lideres antecesores de dos paises son la firme voluntad del PCV.
					
					Dijo estar complacido de que bajo la destacada direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano defendiera el socialismo y mantuviera la estabilidad politica haciendo frente a la amenaza militar y sancion de Estados Unidos y el Occidente y alcanzara grandes exitos en la construccion economica y la mejora de vida del pueblo.
					
					Senalo que esta admirado de la excelente politica y la ferrea voluntad del Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, y le expreso solidaridad.
					
					El PCV aprecia mucho el desarrollo de las relaciones con el PTC, apunto y deseo que se realice el intercambio de exitos y experiencias alcanzados en la construccion del partido y la lucha revolucionaria y se desarrollen las relaciones entres ambos partidos al fomentar el intercambio de viajes y las negociaciones.

articles.title: Presidente de Zimbabwe desea exitos en construccion de Estado prospero en RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente de Zimbabwe desea exitos en construccion de Estado prospero en RPDC 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Republica de Zimbabwe, Robert G. Mugabe, recibio el 31 de julio las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en su pais, Jo Yong Man.
					En la ocasion el mandatario dijo estar complacido del desarrollo favorable de las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises, preparadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Apunto que bajo la guia de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano marcha a pasos firmes por el justo camino optado por si mismo y le deseo mayores exitos en la construccion de un Estado prospero.
